entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 10:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
